src.java.query

Class ColumnResultWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.java.query.ColumnResultWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryResultWriter

    public class ColumnResultWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements QueryResultWriter
    An implementation of QueryResultWriter, writes the query results on disk with the following format:
    query_id doc_id doc_score 1 1 4 1 4 4 ...
    Since:
    10-16-2017

      • saveQueryResultsToFile

        public void saveQueryResultsToFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                   java.util.List<Query> queries)
        Writes the results of a List of Query objects on disk.
        Specified by:
        saveQueryResultsToFile in interface QueryResultWriter
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of a file where the results of the queries will be written into.
        queries - A List of Query that contain the results for each query.
